about.title: About me
about.description: I'm a developer passionate about styling pages. One of my objetives are be in a kind team work in wich I can contribute with myknowledge and may be possible learn from them. I'm still practicing to better handle React and also improve my practices. In the future, I'll like to learn Backend, to be a complete developer.
